episode: I'm starting a new job today.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I'm starting a new job today. It's the first time that I'll actually be using my degree.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: How exciting! You must be thrilled to finally put your skills to use.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I am. I really hope that I am good at it. They're paying me a lot of money. $80,000/yr

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a great salary. No pressure, right?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: A lot but also a lot of hope. Making that much I will actually be able to pay my student loans off.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a huge weight off your shoulders, financially.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes. This is the kind of company that a person retires from, you know.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Sounds like a dream company to have long-term stability.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I've never had that. Most of my other jobs have been waiting tables.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Big change of pace for you, then.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes. and a lot more money!!!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: A definite upgrade!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Do you have any advice for me to make a good impression?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Be yourself, be confident, and listen more than you talk.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: The last one has always been hard for me lol

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's a tough habit to break, but worth it.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes. I can see how that would be the case.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: People tend to appreciate a good listener.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yeah, serving made me pretty good at that! People tip you better when you are friendly.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Server skills can translate well to other roles, surprisingly.
